[wpv-map-marker map_id='individual' marker_id="[wpv-post-id]" marker_title="[wpv-post-title]" marker_field='wpcf-current-google-address' item='@people-location.child']

view-template.post_content:
• [wpv-post-link ]
    • [wpv-conditional if="( $(wpcf-residence-to) ) AND ( $(wpcf-residence-from) )"]
  • Residence from [types field='residence-from' style='text' format='Y' item='@people-location.intermediary'][/types] to [types field='residence-to' style='text' format='Y' item='@people-location.intermediary'][/types]
    • [/wpv-conditional] [wpv-conditional if="( $(wpcf-not-before) ) AND ( $(wpcf-not-after) )"]
  • Residence Not Before [types field='not-before' style='text' format='Y' item='@people-location.intermediary'][/types] and Not After [types field='not-after' style='text' format='Y' item='@people-location.intermediary'][/types]
    • [/wpv-conditional]

  • Residence from [types field='residence-from' style='text' format='Y'][/types] to [types field='residence-to' style='text' format='Y'][/types]

[wpv-conditional if="( $(wpcf-current-google-address) ne '' ) AND ( $(wpcf-current-google-address) ne 'NA' ) AND ( $(wpcf-current-google-address) ne '?' )"] [wpv-map-marker map_id='map' marker_id='[wpv-post-id]' marker_title="[wpv-post-title]" id="$posttype" marker_icon='//victorians.ucalgary.ca/wp-content/plugins/toolset-maps/resources/images/markers/Home.png' marker_field='wpcf-current-google-address']

[wpv-post-title]

[wpv-view name="who-lived-here-popup-map-marker-details"]

[/wpv-map-marker] [/wpv-conditional]

• [wpv-post-link item="@people-location.parent"]
    • [wpv-conditional if="( $(wpcf-residence-to) ) AND ( $(wpcf-residence-from) )"]
  • Residence from [types field='residence-from' style='text' format='Y'][/types] to [types field='residence-to' style='text' format='Y'][/types]
    • [/wpv-conditional] [wpv-conditional if="( $(wpcf-not-before) ) AND ( $(wpcf-not-after) )"]
  • Residence Not Before [types field='not-before' style='text' format='Y'][/types] and Not After [types field='not-after' style='text' format='Y'][/types]
    • [/wpv-conditional]
